text_block_list.text: It had been a few days since we decided to work together on the 『Hero Search』 and I was meeting Zenno Rob Roy in the school library.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……and so, with regards to our Hero, I decided to do some research on my own. Um――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: First, the time of day when Trainer-san met that Hero. It was probably during our free training period, right?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: At that time, lots of Uma Musume are entering and leaving, so it's hard to narrow it down based on individual course usage records……
choice_data_list: So that's why we couldn't find anything……
So that's why we couldn't find anything……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm sorry…… t-then, how about changing our approach!? How about starting by visiting each of the training sites?!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Normally, if they were using the course, they would be one of our students so…… if our Hero is there, you should be able to figure it out in a glance!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Even if I'm the only one that thinks of them that way, there are plenty of girls I could call a hero! Um, for example――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Even though everything she does seems 『A little mysterious』, she's actually a reeeeally smart Uma Musume……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Even though she always falls just one step short, she'll do everything in her power to keep up and close the gap.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……and then, there's Symboli Kris S-san.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: She's a senpai I look up to. Strong, fast, and cool…… and she's already debuted.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Today, that Kris S-san should be running so…… shall we go take a look, Trainer-san!?
Just like usual, after school, the training course was crowded with students doing their free training.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Um, Kris S-san is…… Ah! Over there……! I-it looks like she's already running!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa――
Such innate strength. And such an overwhelming presence, however…… it seemed a little different from the Hero at that time.
『She』 had more of a feeling that she would never let go, of desperation and tenacity, like she was obsessed with winning.
When I turned to Zenno Rob Roy to tell her this――

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: The way she's stepping in…… it may look like she's relying solely on power, but that's wrong. It seems calculated……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: This is her approximate cooldown time…… and her icing time is on the long side? Kris S-san, she's managing her time very strictly.
While writing in her notebook, she was watching training with a serious look in her eyes. Her ears and tail flinched at the sound of the whistle.
Like this, it's almost like―

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Eh!? Ah, no…… today I'm taking a break from free training!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: But, we can continue the Hero Search next time…… Kris S-san doesn't seem to be the 『Hero』 that Trainer-san was looking for.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: T-then…… I need to get going! I'll be heading off n-yow!
She was gone in an instant…… I was planning on heading back too, but a familiar looking notebook was left behind on the benches.
In a panic, she must have left this behind. For now, I opened it to confirm its owner――
It seemed to be about her observations of Symboli Kris S' training today. The page was completely filled.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! I'm just wondering but, are you Rob Roy-san's――
I couldn't help but stare at the notebook. These pages were filled with such dedication. In that calm figure, where was she hiding all this passion?

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: Ah…… Ummmm～! Hello there!

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: No worries! Um, you were together with Rob Roy-san right!? Are you perhaps, Rob Roy-san's trainer!?
Now that I think about it, talk about an exclusive contract with Zenno Rob Roy never came up. We were both just so focused on our Hero.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: Ah, so that's not the case…… sorry for the sudden question. I tend to be in charge of Rob Roy-san's training often, but――

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: That girl, because of an injury, she's passed on several Selection Races…… And most of this time she hasn't seemed very energetic.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: It's that time of year where most people debut so she might be getting impatient. The next Selection Race is still quite a ways off, after all.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: However…… maybe it's because of that, but it seems like she's performing worse than usual more often now.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: I talked to her about being more active in this year's Sports Festival so she could attract the attention of some trainers but――

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: ――But lately, it seems like she's doing less self training. I'm worried she might be losing motivation.

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: ……because of that, when I saw you I thought 『It's her trainer!』 and got so excited. I'm sorry.
The instructor bowed deeply. Without a doubt, the reason her self training time was decreasing was because of the 『Hero Search』. However――

text_block_list.name: Kind-looking Instructor
text_block_list.text: Eh?
She probably has has her reasons for reducing her self training time in order to accompany me in the 『Hero Search』.
choice_data_list: She hasn't given up and isn't running away

text_block_list.text: After all―― in the pages of this notebook she left behind, there was a strong impression of 『I want to get stronger』.
